oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Pitch For Unity Made by King"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; King, Martin Luther, Jr.; sanitation strike;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Article from the Commercial Appeal reporting on the speech made by King the night before his assassination.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Mary B. Clark
